this facility?

our lives.

Perhaps you will even be enough to warm us up
before our bout with Heiyue.
jpnChrName: 黒月との決戦を前に少々、 肩慣らしに付き合って貰おうか？
jpnSearchText:
黒月との決戦を前に少々、
肩慣らしに付き合って貰おうか？

engChrName: Come too close to the fire and you're gonna get burned.
engSearchText:
Come too close to the fire and you're gonna
get burned.
jpnChrName: 抜かせ……
jpnSearchText: 抜かせ……

engChrName: What did he mean by 'arm'?
engSearchText: What did he mean by 'arm'?
jpnChrName: かの企業……？
jpnSearchText: かの企業……？

engChrName: Someone did their research. He's talkin' about this.
engSearchText: Someone did their research. He's talkin' about this.
jpnChrName: ハッ、情報通だな。 ──この得物か？
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、情報通だな。
──この得物か？

engChrName: Several years ago, people were recruited to test that weapon: the stun caliber.
engSearchText:
Several years ago, people were recruited to test that
weapon: the stun caliber.
jpnChrName: 撃剣（スタンキャリバー）──数年前から かの企業がテスターを募集していた試作品。
jpnSearchText:
撃剣（スタンキャリバー）──数年前から
かの企業がテスターを募集していた試作品。

engChrName: However, despite its potential, it was deemed too difficult to use for the average warrior to wield.
engSearchText:
However, despite its potential, it was deemed too
difficult to use for the average warrior to wield.
jpnChrName: どんな状況にも対応可能な性能を持ちながら 扱いの難しさから広まらなかった武装……
jpnSearchText:
どんな状況にも対応可能な性能を持ちながら
扱いの難しさから広まらなかった武装……

engChrName: I never expected to meet one in actual combat.
engSearchText: I never expected to meet one in actual combat.
jpnChrName: よもや使っている者がいるとはな？
jpnSearchText: よもや使っている者がいるとはな？

engChrName: Speakin' of weapons, that's a gnarly pair of gauntlets you got there.
engSearchText:
Speakin' of weapons, that's a gnarly pair of gauntlets
you got there.
jpnChrName: そっちこそ、軍用格闘術にしちゃ エゲツねえ武装を使うじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
そっちこそ、軍用格闘術にしちゃ
エゲツねえ武装を使うじゃねえか。

engChrName: North Ambrian make if I had to guess.
engSearchText: North Ambrian make if I had to guess.
jpnChrName: それも含めての“旧大公国式”かい？
jpnSearchText: それも含めての“旧大公国式”かい？

engChrName: Hmph.
engSearchText: Hmph.
jpnSearchText: フ……

engChrName: Good grief. You men and your obsessions with weapons. The important part is if it can kill someone or not.
engSearchText:
Good grief. You men and your obsessions
with weapons. The important part is if it can kill
someone or not.
jpnChrName: やれやれ、これだから男ってのは。 武器なんざ使えりゃ何でもいいだろうに。
jpnSearchText:
やれやれ、これだから男ってのは。
武器なんざ使えりゃ何でもいいだろうに。

engChrName: I do love how my needlegun takes down targets, though.
engSearchText:
I do love how my needlegun takes down
targets, though.
jpnChrName: ──ま、数十もの短針を一気に放てる コイツはアタシも気に入っているがねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
──ま、数十もの短針を一気に放てる
コイツはアタシも気に入っているがねぇ。

engChrName: Poking a big, strong man full of holes is just the best!
engSearchText: Poking a big, strong man full of holes is just the best!
jpnChrName: こいつで屈強な男共のカラダを ズタズタにするのが気持ちいいのさ！
jpnSearchText:
こいつで屈強な男共のカラダを
ズタズタにするのが気持ちいいのさ！

engChrName: Still, tearing a doll like blondie to shreds has its charms, too.
engSearchText:
Still, tearing a doll like blondie to shreds has its
charms, too.
jpnChrName: ま、お嬢ちゃんたちみたいな 柔らかい肉も気持ちよさそうだけどねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、お嬢ちゃんたちみたいな
柔らかい肉も気持ちよさそうだけどねぇ。

engChrName: That kind of talk has no place on an honorable battlefield.
engSearchText:
That kind of talk has no place on an
honorable battlefield.
jpnChrName: 戦場に男も女もありません。
jpnSearchText: 戦場に男も女もありません。

engChrName: Keep your defensive shards handy. Should be able to repel her needles some.
engSearchText:
Keep your defensive shards handy. Should be able
to repel her needles some.
jpnChrName: 防御シャードで備えろ。 少しは防げるはずだ。
jpnSearchText:
防御シャードで備えろ。
少しは防げるはずだ。

engChrName: I'm so done listening to these crazy people run their mouths.
engSearchText:
I'm so done listening to these crazy people run
their mouths.
jpnChrName: ──さっきから聞いてりゃ、 下らねえことをグチャグチャと……
jpnSearchText:
──さっきから聞いてりゃ、
下らねえことをグチャグチャと……

engChrName: I've got a thousand reasons to smash your faces in: revenge, keeping this city safe...
engSearchText:
I've got a thousand reasons to smash your faces in:
revenge, keeping this city safe...
jpnChrName: セイたちの仇や煌都の平穏…… 理由は腐るほどあるが──
jpnSearchText:
セイたちの仇や煌都の平穏……
理由は腐るほどあるが──
……！？
……ッ………

engChrName: ...but more than anything, I've got a score to settle with myself.
engSearchText:
...but more than anything, I've got a score to settle
with myself.
jpnChrName: 何より俺は、てめぇ自身にケジメを 付けるためにここにやって来た──！
jpnSearchText:
何より俺は、てめぇ自身にケジメを
付けるためにここにやって来た──！

engChrName: It'd be better if I could do this alone, but I'll do whatever it takes to see this through!
engSearchText:
It'd be better if I could do this alone, but I'll do
whatever it takes to see this through!
jpnChrName: 助っ人に頼るのは癪だが ここでまとめて決着を付けてやるよ！
jpnSearchText:
助っ人に頼るのは癪だが
ここでまとめて決着を付けてやるよ！

engChrName: Hahaha! Fine! Let's get to the good part early!
engSearchText: Hahaha! Fine! Let's get to the good part early!
jpnChrName: ハハハ、そうこなくっちゃ！ メインディッシュの一つはアンタだしね！
jpnSearchText:
ハハハ、そうこなくっちゃ！
メインディッシュの一つはアンタだしね！

engChrName: Bring all of your anger and resentment to bear against us!
engSearchText:
Bring all of your anger and resentment to bear
against us!
jpnChrName: 抑えきれぬ怒りと慚愧の全てを ぶつけてみせるがいい──！！
jpnSearchText:
抑えきれぬ怒りと慚愧の全てを
ぶつけてみせるがいい──！！

engChrName: Received the Carabia holo core.
engSearchText: Received the Carabia holo core.
jpnChrName: ホロウコア『Carabia -カラビア-』を手に入れた。
jpnSearchText: <C1>ホロウコア『Carabia -カラビア-』を手に入れた。

engChrName: RAAAAAH!
engSearchText: RAAAAAH!
jpnChrName: っ……オオオオオオオっ！！
jpnSearchText: っ……オオオオオオオっ！！

engChrName: Whoa!
engSearchText: Whoa!
jpnChrName: おっと……！？
jpnSearchText: おっと……！？

engChrName: Ngh!
engSearchText: Ngh!
jpnChrName: ムウッ……！！
jpnSearchText: ムウッ……！！

engChrName: You. Will. PAY!
engSearchText: You. Will. PAY!
jpnChrName: ……許さねえ……絶対に………
jpnSearchText: ……許さねえ……絶対に………

engChrName: A-Aaron...
engSearchText: A-Aaron...
jpnChrName: ア、アーロンさん……
jpnSearchText: ア、アーロンさん……

engChrName: All that anger...
engSearchText: All that anger...
jpnChrName: なんという鬼気……
jpnSearchText: なんという鬼気……

engChrName: Don't lose control of yourself.
engSearchText: Don't lose control of yourself.
jpnChrName: ──落ち着けや、麒麟児。
jpnSearchText: ──落ち着けや、麒麟児。

engChrName: You might be giving them exactly what they want.
engSearchText: You might be giving them exactly what they want.
jpnChrName: このままだとコイツらの狙いに 嵌っちまうかもしれねぇぞ……？
jpnSearchText:
このままだとコイツらの狙いに
嵌っちまうかもしれねぇぞ……？

engChrName: What?!
engSearchText: What?!
jpnChrName: なにィ……！？
jpnSearchText: なにィ……！？

engChrName: Earlier she said fighting us was 'the good part.'
engSearchText: Earlier she said fighting us was 'the good part.'
jpnChrName: さっきその女はお前のことを メインディッシュの一つと言った。
jpnSearchText:
さっきその女はお前のことを
メインディッシュの一つと言った。

engChrName: If their goal really is wipin' out Heiyue, that's a pretty weird thing to say, ain't it?
engSearchText:
If their goal really is wipin' out Heiyue, that's a pretty
weird thing to say, ain't it?
jpnChrName: 本命の一つはあくまで 黒月との決戦なんだろうが……
jpnSearchText:
本命の一つはあくまで
黒月との決戦なんだろうが……

engChrName: *sigh* Me and my big mouth.
engSearchText: *sigh* Me and my big mouth.
jpnChrName: やれやれ、アタシとしたことが つい口を滑らせちまったか。
jpnSearchText:
やれやれ、アタシとしたことが
つい口を滑らせちまったか。

engChrName: Let's get everyone on the same page.
engSearchText: Let's get everyone on the same page.
jpnChrName: まあいいさ、ここまで来たら 全部教えてあげようじゃないか。
jpnSearchText:
まあいいさ、ここまで来たら
全部教えてあげようじゃないか。

engChrName: First off, we have to talk about a bit of history—a fairy tale, if you will.
engSearchText:
First off, we have to talk about a bit of history—a
fairy tale, if you will.
jpnChrName: まずは昔話── いいや、お伽話と洒落込もうかねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
まずは昔話──
いいや、お伽話と洒落込もうかねぇ。

engChrName: Wh-What?
engSearchText: Wh-What?
jpnChrName: お、お伽話……？
jpnSearchText: お、お伽話……？
…………………………

engChrName: It's a tragic legend passed down in Langport's Eastern Quarter.
engSearchText:
It's a tragic legend passed down in Langport's
Eastern Quarter.
jpnChrName: 煌都ラングポート、とりわけ東方人街で 伝えられてきた忌まわしき伝承さ。
jpnSearchText:
煌都ラングポート、とりわけ東方人街で
伝えられてきた忌まわしき伝承さ。

engChrName: In times of great turmoil, a mythic being will appear. Sometimes it takes only a few decades—and others, as long as a century.
engSearchText:
In times of great turmoil, a mythic being will appear.
Sometimes it takes only a few decades—and others,
as long as a century.
jpnChrName: 数十年から百年に一度、 時代の節目に煌都に現れるという──
jpnSearchText:
数十年から百年に一度、
時代の節目に煌都に現れるという──

engChrName: The being of unparalleled strength and charisma always subjugates the Eastern people— including Heiyue.
engSearchText:
The being of unparalleled strength and charisma
always subjugates the Eastern people—
including Heiyue.
jpnChrName: 黒月を含めた東方人たちを導き、 支配し、隷属させる絶対的な存在。
jpnSearchText:
黒月を含めた東方人たちを導き、
支配し、隷属させる絶対的な存在。

engChrName: He is a warrior, a liberator, and a dictator.
engSearchText: He is a warrior, a liberator, and a dictator.
jpnChrName: 君主にして戦士、解放者にして支配者──
jpnSearchText: 君主にして戦士、解放者にして支配者──

engChrName: And most of all...a demon.
engSearchText: And most of all...a demon.
jpnChrName: 絶大な力とカリスマ性を備えた 人の枠を遙かに超える──魔人。
jpnSearchText:
絶大な力とカリスマ性を備えた
人の枠を遙かに超える──魔人。

engChrName: Stricken with fear, the people all began to refer to him as...
engSearchText:
Stricken with fear, the people all began to refer to
him as...
jpnChrName: いつしか畏怖を込めて こう呼ばれるようになったという──
jpnSearchText:
いつしか畏怖を込めて
こう呼ばれるようになったという──

engChrName: ...the 'Tyrant.'
engSearchText: ...the 'Tyrant.'
jpnChrName: 《大君（タイクン）》、とな。
jpnSearchText: 《大君（タイクン）》、とな。
……！！

engChrName: I recognize that name...
engSearchText: I recognize that name...
jpnSearchText: 《大君》……

engChrName: The old woman at the church mentioned it.
engSearchText: The old woman at the church mentioned it.
jpnChrName: あのお婆さんから聞いた……
jpnSearchText: あのお婆さんから聞いた……

engChrName: Some part of this city's history that the elders want kept quiet, huh?
engSearchText:
Some part of this city's history that the elders want
kept quiet, huh?
jpnChrName: この地と同じく、長老たちに 封じられた煌都の闇って所か……
jpnSearchText:
この地と同じく、長老たちに
封じられた煌都の闇って所か……

engChrName: The last one had to have appeared a long time ago, right?
engSearchText:
The last one had to have appeared a long time
ago, right?
jpnChrName: いずれにせよ大昔の話なんだろうが？
jpnSearchText: いずれにせよ大昔の話なんだろうが？

engChrName: Indeed.
engSearchText: Indeed.
jpnChrName: そう、昔の話。
jpnSearchText: そう、昔の話。

engChrName: It's been about forty years since the last Tyrant appeared.
engSearchText:
It's been about forty years since the last
Tyrant appeared.
jpnChrName: 先代の《大君》が煌都に現れたのは もはや半世紀も昔のこと。
jpnSearchText:
先代の《大君》が煌都に現れたのは
もはや半世紀も昔のこと。

engChrName: They say compared to his predecessors, this one was a cut above.
engSearchText:
They say compared to his predecessors, this one was a
cut above.
jpnChrName: 代々の中でも特に傑物だったそうでねぇ。
jpnSearchText: 代々の中でも特に傑物だったそうでねぇ。

engChrName: He took control of that era's Heiyue and Yin and used them to rule Langport following the chaos of the Orbal Revolution.
engSearchText:
He took control of that era's Heiyue and Yin and
used them to rule Langport following the chaos of the
Orbal Revolution.
jpnChrName: 黒月や《銀》すら従え、導力革命直後の 変革期の中でも見事にラングポートを治め──
jpnSearchText:
黒月や《銀》すら従え、導力革命直後の
変革期の中でも見事にラングポートを治め──

engChrName: Under him, Easterners gained a greater foothold in the Republic.
engSearchText:
Under him, Easterners gained a greater foothold in
the Republic.
jpnChrName: 東方人たちの勢力を更に拡大させたそうだ。
jpnSearchText: 東方人たちの勢力を更に拡大させたそうだ。

engChrName: In some ways, he reminds me of our boss.
engSearchText: In some ways, he reminds me of our boss.
jpnChrName: フフ……そういう所は ウチのボスと似てるかもしれないねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
フフ……そういう所は
ウチのボスと似てるかもしれないねぇ。

engChrName: However, his rule did not last.
engSearchText: However, his rule did not last.
jpnChrName: だが、その統治は次第に歪んでいった。
jpnSearchText: だが、その統治は次第に歪んでいった。

engChrName: The Tyrant's rule was predicated on reason as much as it was fear.
engSearchText:
The Tyrant's rule was predicated on reason
as much as it was fear.
jpnChrName: ひたすら正しい判断を下す《大君》、 だがそこに少しの情を挟む余地もなかった。
jpnSearchText:
ひたすら正しい判断を下す《大君》、
だがそこに少しの情を挟む余地もなかった。

engChrName: His strict, rational decision-making did improve the lives of his subjects, but it also ignored the distress of those adversely affected.
engSearchText:
His strict, rational decision-making did improve the
lives of his subjects, but it also ignored the distress of
those adversely affected.
jpnChrName: 正しさに従い創造し、正しさに従い破壊する。 ──魂すら支配するかのような人在らざる魔人。
jpnSearchText:
正しさに従い創造し、正しさに従い破壊する。
──魂すら支配するかのような人在らざる魔人。

engChrName: Over time, the accumulated distress evolved into a full-blown panic. Yet Calvard's government did not intervene.
engSearchText:
Over time, the accumulated distress evolved into a
full-blown panic. Yet Calvard's government did
not intervene.
jpnChrName: 共和国政府の介入すら物ともせず のしかかる“恐怖”が煌都を蝕んでいった。
jpnSearchText:
共和国政府の介入すら物ともせず
のしかかる“恐怖”が煌都を蝕んでいった。

engChrName: So the elders of Heiyue chose to rebel.
engSearchText: So the elders of Heiyue chose to rebel.
jpnChrName: 結局──当時の黒月長老たちは その“恐怖”に耐えられなかったらしい。
jpnSearchText:
結局──当時の黒月長老たちは
その“恐怖”に耐えられなかったらしい。

engChrName: To defeat the demon they so revered, they enlisted the help of Yin and outsiders—pride be damned.
engSearchText:
To defeat the demon they so revered, they enlisted
the help of Yin and outsiders—pride be damned.
jpnChrName: 主として仰いでいた《大君》を裏切り、 恥も外聞も捨てて《銀》や外部の力を借り……
jpnSearchText:
主として仰いでいた《大君》を裏切り、
恥も外聞も捨てて《銀》や外部の力を借り……

engChrName: After a bloody battle, they managed to seal the Tyrant away.
engSearchText:
After a bloody battle, they managed to seal the
Tyrant away.
jpnChrName: 死闘の果てとある地に《大君》を封じ込めて 孤独の中で息絶えさせたそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
死闘の果てとある地に《大君》を封じ込めて
孤独の中で息絶えさせたそうだ。

engChrName: He drew his last breaths in solitude here at Heilong Cheng Zhai.
engSearchText:
He drew his last breaths in solitude here at Heilong
Cheng Zhai.
jpnChrName: ──その場所が、ここ。 《黒龍城砦（ヘイロンジャーイセン）》ってわけさ。
jpnSearchText:
──その場所が、ここ。
《黒龍城砦（ヘイロンジャーイセン）》ってわけさ。

engChrName: Th-That all really happened?
engSearchText: Th-That all really happened?
jpnChrName: そ、そんな事が４０年前に……
jpnSearchText: そ、そんな事が４０年前に……

engChrName: So that whole story about sealing up the mines was just to keep people out, huh?
engSearchText:
So that whole story about sealing up the mines was
just to keep people out, huh?
jpnChrName: 鉱山閉鎖っつうのは 表向きの理由って訳か……
jpnSearchText:
鉱山閉鎖っつうのは
表向きの理由って訳か……

engChrName: No way... But that would mean...
engSearchText: No way... But that would mean...
jpnChrName: 馬鹿……な…… ………そんな話が………
jpnSearchText:
馬鹿……な……
………そんな話が………

engChrName: Aaron?
engSearchText: Aaron?
jpnChrName: ア、アーロンさん……？
jpnSearchText: ア、アーロンさん……？

engChrName: Get a grip, man!
engSearchText: Get a grip, man!
jpnChrName: チッ……しっかりしろ！！
jpnSearchText: チッ……しっかりしろ！！

engChrName: It appears our intel was accurate.
engSearchText: It appears our intel was accurate.
jpnChrName: ……やはり 聞いていた通りだったようだな。
jpnSearchText:
……やはり
聞いていた通りだったようだな。

engChrName: Aaron Wei, you are the new Tyrant.
engSearchText: Aaron Wei, you are the new Tyrant.
jpnChrName: アーロン・ウェイ── お前が、当代の《大君》だ。
jpnSearchText:
アーロン・ウェイ──
お前が、当代の《大君》だ。

engChrName: What?!
engSearchText: What?!
jpnSearchText: え……！？

engChrName: It can't be...
engSearchText: It can't be...
jpnChrName: ま、まさか………
jpnSearchText: ま、まさか………

engChrName: Don't mess with me!
engSearchText: Don't mess with me!
jpnChrName: ふざけんなッッ！！
jpnSearchText: ふざけんなッッ！！

engChrName: I was born and raised in Langport by my mom!
engSearchText: I was born and raised in Langport by my mom!
jpnChrName: 俺はアーロン・ウェイ──！ ユエファ・ウェイの息子で煌都生まれの煌都育ち！
jpnSearchText:
俺はアーロン・ウェイ──！
ユエファ・ウェイの息子で煌都生まれの煌都育ち！

engChrName: She may have died and left me an orphan, but I've lived a great life here!
engSearchText:
She may have died and left me an orphan, but I've
lived a great life here!
jpnChrName: オフクロが亡くなって天涯孤独になったが、 それでも皆と面白おかしく暮らしてきた！
jpnSearchText:
オフクロが亡くなって天涯孤独になったが、
それでも皆と面白おかしく暮らしてきた！

engChrName: I won't let you make that all out as the work of some old wives' tale!
engSearchText:
I won't let you make that all out as the work of some
old wives' tale!

withstand THAT!

jpnSearchText:
あいつらが……オフクロが愛した
この街のモヤを晴らすためにも……

engChrName: So please! Help me kick those bastards out of our town and make things right!
engSearchText:
So please! Help me kick those bastards out of our
town and make things right!
jpnChrName: 頼む──ヤツらをこの手で 追い払うのを手伝ってくれねえか！？
jpnSearchText:
頼む──ヤツらをこの手で
追い払うのを手伝ってくれねえか！？

engChrName: Aaron Wei! Listen up!
engSearchText: Aaron Wei! Listen up!
jpnChrName: 聞こえてるか、アーロン・ウェイ！
jpnSearchText: 聞こえてるか、アーロン・ウェイ！

engChrName: Van?
engSearchText: Van?
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん……！？
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさん……！？

engChrName: Back up! He can't hear you anymore!
engSearchText: Back up! He can't hear you anymore!
jpnChrName: 駄目です……！ もう声なんて届いて──
jpnSearchText:
駄目です……！
もう声なんて届いて──

engChrName: If you're still in there somewhere, open your damn eyes!
engSearchText:
If you're still in there somewhere, open your
damn eyes!
jpnChrName: 聞こえてるなら返事をしろ！ 目を覚ましやがれ！
jpnSearchText:
聞こえてるなら返事をしろ！
目を覚ましやがれ！

engChrName: I... I AM...
engSearchText: I... I AM...
jpnSearchText: お、おれ……ハ…………

engChrName: THE TYRANT... RULER OF LANGPORT...
engSearchText: THE TYRANT... RULER OF LANGPORT...
jpnChrName: 大君……おれハ………大君…………
jpnSearchText: 大君……おれハ………大君…………

engChrName: I-It's working?!
engSearchText: I-It's working?!
jpnChrName: 反応した……！？
jpnSearchText: 反応した……！？

engChrName: Aaron must have heard his words.
engSearchText: Aaron must have heard his words.
jpnChrName: ヴァンさんの言葉が届いて……！
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさんの言葉が届いて……！

engChrName: You ain't some Tyrant! You're Aaron Wei!
engSearchText: You ain't some Tyrant! You're Aaron Wei!
jpnChrName: 《大君》なんかじゃねえ！ お前はアーロン・ウェイだ！
jpnSearchText:
《大君》なんかじゃねえ！
お前はアーロン・ウェイだ！

engChrName: Langport's prodigy! The Little Conqueror! The Eastern Quarter's favorite troublemaker!
engSearchText:
Langport's prodigy! The Little Conqueror!
The Eastern Quarter's favorite troublemaker!
jpnChrName: 《煌都の麒麟児》、《羅州の小覇王》、 東方人街の申し子アーロン！
jpnSearchText:
《煌都の麒麟児》、《羅州の小覇王》、
東方人街の申し子アーロン！

engChrName: Where do you get off being a cocky runt all the damn time and then just forgetting everything?!
engSearchText:
Where do you get off being a cocky runt all the
damn time and then just forgetting everything?!
jpnChrName: 散々イキりちらしてたクセに 忘れてんじゃねえぞ、クソガキが！
jpnSearchText:
散々イキりちらしてたクセに
忘れてんじゃねえぞ、クソガキが！

engChrName: I MUST FIGHT... MUST GUIDE... MUST RULE...
engSearchText:
I MUST FIGHT... MUST GUIDE...
MUST RULE...
jpnChrName: 戦ワネバ……導カネバ………支配……セネバ…………
jpnSearchText: 戦ワネバ……導カネバ………支配……セネバ…………

engChrName: THAT IS MY EVERYTHING—MY DESTINY.
engSearchText: THAT IS MY EVERYTHING—MY DESTINY.
jpnChrName: ソレガ………我ガ使命……我ガ………宿命…………
jpnSearchText: ソレガ………我ガ使命……我ガ………宿命…………
ッ……

engChrName: SHUT THE HELL UP!
engSearchText: SHUT THE HELL UP!
jpnChrName: 甘ったれるんじゃねえええッッ！！！
jpnSearchText: 甘ったれるんじゃねえええッッ！！！

engChrName: Don't give me that destiny garbage!
engSearchText: Don't give me that destiny garbage!
jpnChrName: 宿命！？　生まれ変わり！？
jpnSearchText: 宿命！？　生まれ変わり！？

engChrName: It's your life! Don't let some old-ass demon tell you how to live it!
engSearchText:
It's your life! Don't let some old-ass demon tell you
how to live it!
jpnChrName: んなくだらねえモンのために てめえの人生を差し出すつもりかよ！
jpnSearchText:
んなくだらねえモンのために
てめえの人生を差し出すつもりかよ！

engChrName: What happened to the guy who loves Langport with all his heart?!
engSearchText:
What happened to the guy who loves Langport with
all his heart?!
jpnChrName: 言っただろうが！ あの街に住んでる連中が好きって──
jpnSearchText:
言っただろうが！
あの街に住んでる連中が好きって──

engChrName: You told me you were gonna keep it safe. Safe for everyone who loves it like you do!
engSearchText:
You told me you were gonna keep it safe. Safe for
everyone who loves it like you do!
jpnChrName: オフクロさんが愛したあの街を その手で守って、皆と共にいたいって！
jpnSearchText:
オフクロさんが愛したあの街を
その手で守って、皆と共にいたいって！

engChrName: Did you forget?! You're just gonna let some monster waltz in and trash it?!
engSearchText:
Did you forget?! You're just gonna let some monster
waltz in and trash it?!
jpnChrName: ──なのに全部放り出して 化物なんかに壊させていいのかよ！？
jpnSearchText:
──なのに全部放り出して
化物なんかに壊させていいのかよ！？
ッ………

engChrName: Aaron! There are so many people who care about you—you mustn't forget that!
engSearchText:
Aaron! There are so many people who care about
you—you mustn't forget that!
jpnChrName: アーロンさん、思い出してください！ 貴方を大事に思っている人は沢山います！
jpnSearchText:
アーロンさん、思い出してください！
貴方を大事に思っている人は沢山います！

engChrName: Not only Ashen, Halle, Jack, and the members of Heiyue—it's everyone living in the Eastern Quarter!
engSearchText:
Not only Ashen, Halle, Jack, and the members of
Heiyue—it's everyone living in the Eastern Quarter!
jpnChrName: アシェンさん、ハルさんにジャックさん…… 東方人街の皆さんに黒月の方々だって……！
jpnSearchText:
アシェンさん、ハルさんにジャックさん……
東方人街の皆さんに黒月の方々だって……！

engChrName: They're all waiting for you to come back home!
engSearchText: They're all waiting for you to come back home!
jpnChrName: みんな貴方の帰りを待っています！
jpnSearchText: みんな貴方の帰りを待っています！

engChrName: It's not really my place to speak for them...
engSearchText: It's not really my place to speak for them...
jpnChrName: きっと、今はいないお友だちも──
jpnSearchText: きっと、今はいないお友だちも──

engChrName: ...but I know your friends would be calling you back, too!
engSearchText:
...but I know your friends would be calling you
back, too!
jpnChrName: アーロンさんには、アーロンさんのままで いて欲しいはずです！
jpnSearchText:
アーロンさんには、アーロンさんのままで
いて欲しいはずです！

engChrName: So, please, don't give up!
engSearchText: So, please, don't give up!
jpnChrName: ですから……負けないでくださいっ！
jpnSearchText: ですから……負けないでくださいっ！

engChrName: Letting destiny and that bastard sweep you along is the easy way out.
engSearchText:
Letting destiny and that bastard sweep you along is
the easy way out.
jpnChrName: それでも、てめえが《大君》を、 運命っつー安易な道を選ぶのなら──
jpnSearchText:
それでも、てめえが《大君》を、
運命っつー安易な道を選ぶのなら──

engChrName: You're just running away! What happened to proving that you belong here?!
engSearchText:
You're just running away! What happened to proving
that you belong here?!
jpnChrName: それはただの逃げだ！　甘えだ！ てめえの足で立てなかった証拠だろう！
jpnSearchText:
それはただの逃げだ！　甘えだ！
てめえの足で立てなかった証拠だろう！

engChrName: I guess you just don't have what it takes. Do ya?!
engSearchText: I guess you just don't have what it takes. Do ya?!
jpnChrName: 随分ぬるいじゃねえか、アーロン・ウェイ！！
jpnSearchText: 随分ぬるいじゃねえか、アーロン・ウェイ！！
………………………………
…………………

engChrName: YOU THINK...THIS WILL STOP ME?
engSearchText: YOU THINK...THIS WILL STOP ME?
jpnChrName: ……好キ勝手………言イヤガッテ……！
jpnSearchText: ……好キ勝手………言イヤガッテ……！

engChrName: WHO THE HELL...DO YOU THINK...I AM?
engSearchText: WHO THE HELL...DO YOU THINK...I AM?
jpnChrName: おれヲ……誰だト………思ッてやガル………
jpnSearchText: おれヲ……誰だト………思ッてやガル………

engChrName: ARGH... I AM...
engSearchText: ARGH... I AM...
jpnChrName: おれハ……！　俺は………オレは……………
jpnSearchText: おれハ……！　俺は………オレは……………

engChrName: ...AARON WEI!
engSearchText: ...AARON WEI!
jpnChrName: アーロン・ウェイだあああああッッ！！！
jpnSearchText: アーロン・ウェイだあああああッッ！！！

engChrName: AAAAAARGH!
engSearchText: AAAAAARGH!
jpnChrName: オオオオオオオオオオオ───……
jpnSearchText: オオオオオオオオオオオ───……
………………………………

engChrName: He...did it.
engSearchText: He...did it.
jpnSearchText: ……戻っ、た…………

engChrName: The evil spirit has vanished.
engSearchText: The evil spirit has vanished.
jpnChrName: 悪しき息吹も…… ……治まりました……
jpnSearchText:
悪しき息吹も……
……治まりました……

engChrName: Heh. Nice work, kid.
engSearchText: Heh. Nice work, kid.
jpnChrName: ああ…… ヤバイ気配も完全に消えている。
jpnSearchText:
ああ……
ヤバイ気配も完全に消えている。

engChrName: Teach that thing who's runnin' the show.
engSearchText: Teach that thing who's runnin' the show.
jpnChrName: “乗り越えやがった”みてぇだな。
jpnSearchText: “乗り越えやがった”みてぇだな。

engChrName: Oh, thank goodness...
engSearchText: Oh, thank goodness...
jpnChrName: アーロンさん…… ……よかった…………
jpnSearchText:
アーロンさん……
……よかった…………

engChrName: I could sense two souls within him.
engSearchText: I could sense two souls within him.
jpnChrName: ……“彼”の中で 二つの息吹を感じました。
jpnSearchText:
……“彼”の中で
二つの息吹を感じました。

engChrName: He must have defeated the demon.
engSearchText: He must have defeated the demon.
jpnChrName: 多分、それに打ち克って……
jpnSearchText: 多分、それに打ち克って……

engChrName: *cough* *cough*
engSearchText: *cough* *cough*
jpnChrName: ゲホッ……ケホ……クッ………
jpnSearchText: ゲホッ……ケホ……クッ………

engChrName: Aaron!
engSearchText: Aaron!
jpnChrName: アーロンさんっ！
jpnSearchText: アーロンさんっ！

engChrName: Are you all right?!
engSearchText: Are you all right?!
jpnChrName: 大丈夫ですか……！？
jpnSearchText: 大丈夫ですか……！？

engChrName: Yeah... I think so...
engSearchText: Yeah... I think so...
jpnChrName: ああ……… ……それより……俺は……
jpnSearchText:
ああ………
……それより……俺は……

engChrName: What happened to the Tyrant?
engSearchText: What happened to the Tyrant?
jpnChrName: 大君………あの野郎は………？
jpnSearchText: 大君………あの野郎は………？

engChrName: Got his ass beat. Now you can go back to being a brat.
engSearchText:
Got his ass beat. Now you can go back to being
a brat.
jpnChrName: 綺麗さっぱり消えちまった。 元のクソガキに完全に戻ってるぞ。
jpnSearchText:
綺麗さっぱり消えちまった。
元のクソガキに完全に戻ってるぞ。

engChrName: But a brat that managed to save this town.
engSearchText: But a brat that managed to save this town.
jpnChrName: ちゃんと──守れたじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText: ちゃんと──守れたじゃねえか？

engChrName: Haha... I did, huh?
engSearchText: Haha... I did, huh?
jpnChrName: ハハッ……そう、かよ。
jpnSearchText: ハハッ……そう、かよ。
…………………………………

engChrName: It's finally over...
engSearchText: It's finally over...
jpnChrName: ようやく終わったんですね…… ……今回の一連の事件が………
jpnSearchText:
ようやく終わったんですね……
……今回の一連の事件が………

engChrName: Without the Tyrant's help, Almata doesn't stand a chance of beating Heiyue.
engSearchText:
Without the Tyrant's help, Almata doesn't stand a
chance of beating Heiyue.
jpnChrName: はい……陽動も失敗ですし。
jpnSearchText: はい……陽動も失敗ですし。

engChrName: They should be pulling out of the city soon.
engSearchText: They should be pulling out of the city soon.
jpnChrName: 今ごろアルマータたちも 撤退していると思います……
jpnSearchText:
今ごろアルマータたちも
撤退していると思います……

engChrName: You all fought admirably.
engSearchText: You all fought admirably.
jpnChrName: ──大義であったな。 裏解決屋にアーロンよ。
jpnSearchText:
──大義であったな。
裏解決屋にアーロンよ。

engChrName: Lǎo Yéye...?!
engSearchText: Lǎo Yéye...?!
jpnChrName: ギエン、爺さん……！？
jpnSearchText: ギエン、爺さん……！？

engChrName: Wh-What are you doing here?
engSearchText: Wh-What are you doing here?
jpnChrName: ど、どうしてこの城砦に？
jpnSearchText: ど、どうしてこの城砦に？

engChrName: Oh! He must have brought reinforcements.
engSearchText: Oh! He must have brought reinforcements.
jpnChrName: あ……ひょっとして 加勢に来て下さっていたとか……
jpnSearchText:
あ……ひょっとして
加勢に来て下さっていたとか……
……………………………

engChrName: Indeed. We only just arrived.
engSearchText: Indeed. We only just arrived.
jpnChrName: うむ、先ほど到着したばかりでな。
jpnSearchText: うむ、先ほど到着したばかりでな。

engChrName: I had to be sure we had a sufficient force in the event that you might fail.
engSearchText:
I had to be sure we had a sufficient force in the event
that you might fail.
jpnChrName: ヌシらが解決できなかった時に備え、 密かに戦力を整えていたわけだ。
jpnSearchText:
ヌシらが解決できなかった時に備え、
密かに戦力を整えていたわけだ。

engChrName: However, I see my fears were unfounded.
engSearchText: However, I see my fears were unfounded.
jpnChrName: だが無用の備えだったようだ──
jpnSearchText: だが無用の備えだったようだ──

engChrName: Rest assured, you will be suitably compensated for what you have done this day.
engSearchText:
Rest assured, you will be suitably compensated for
what you have done this day.
jpnChrName: 今回の件、その働きに相応しい 報酬を取らせることを約束しよう。
jpnSearchText:
今回の件、その働きに相応しい
報酬を取らせることを約束しよう。

engChrName: Now then, a boat is waiting down below to return you to the city. Allow us to handle the remaining business here.
engSearchText:
Now then, a boat is waiting down below to return you
to the city. Allow us to handle the remaining
business here.
jpnChrName: 下に船も呼んだ──後のことは儂に任せ、 煌都に戻って休むといい。
jpnSearchText:
下に船も呼んだ──後のことは儂に任せ、
煌都に戻って休むといい。

engChrName: As for you, Aaron, come with me. Your wounds are deep, and we have much to discuss.
engSearchText:
As for you, Aaron, come with me. Your wounds are
deep, and we have much to discuss.
jpnChrName: アーロンは儂と共に来るがいい。 傷も深いようだし、後始末の話もある。
jpnSearchText:
アーロンは儂と共に来るがいい。
傷も深いようだし、後始末の話もある。

engChrName: Hah. And for a second there I was happy to see you, too.
engSearchText:
Hah. And for a second there I was happy to see
you, too.
jpnChrName: チッ、久々に会ったと思ったら…… 相変わらず抜け目ねぇ爺さんだぜ。
jpnSearchText:
チッ、久々に会ったと思ったら……
相変わらず抜け目ねぇ爺さんだぜ。

engChrName: Fine, fine. Let's get this over with.
engSearchText: Fine, fine. Let's get this over with.
jpnChrName: だがまあ、確かに ここからは黒月の出番か……
jpnSearchText:
だがまあ、確かに
ここからは黒月の出番か……

engChrName: (Heehee. All's well that ends well, I suppose.)
engSearchText: (Heehee. All's well that ends well, I suppose.)
jpnChrName: （ふふ……   良かったですね、アーロンさん。）
jpnSearchText:
（ふふ……
良かったですね、アーロンさん。）

engChrName: (Yeah. I'm glad they get to talk like this.)
engSearchText: (Yeah. I'm glad they get to talk like this.)
jpnChrName: （はい、最近あんまり   話してなかったみたいですし……）
jpnSearchText:
（はい、最近あんまり
話してなかったみたいですし……）

engChrName: Hold up.
engSearchText: Hold up.
jpnChrName: ──待てよ、爺さん。
jpnSearchText: ──待てよ、爺さん。
……？

engChrName: Is something the matter, spriggan?
engSearchText: Is something the matter, spriggan?
jpnChrName: どうした、裏解決屋（スプリガン）？
jpnSearchText: どうした、裏解決屋（スプリガン）？

engChrName: If it concerns your compensation, my son will handle that matter in my stead.
engSearchText:
If it concerns your compensation, my son will handle
that matter in my stead.
jpnChrName: 報酬については息子に伝えるといい。 悪いようにはせん。
jpnSearchText:
報酬については息子に伝えるといい。
悪いようにはせん。

engChrName: Good to know, but actually, it's somethin' else.
engSearchText: Good to know, but actually, it's somethin' else.
jpnChrName: それはありがたいが、そっちじゃねぇ。 確かめたいことがあるんでね。
jpnSearchText:
それはありがたいが、そっちじゃねぇ。
確かめたいことがあるんでね。

engChrName: Say, you were in cahoots with Almata, weren't you?
engSearchText: Say, you were in cahoots with Almata, weren't you?
jpnChrName: あんた── アルマータと手を組んでやがったな？
jpnSearchText:
あんた──
アルマータと手を組んでやがったな？

engChrName: What?!
engSearchText: What?!
jpnChrName: ！？　ハアアアッ！？
jpnSearchText: ！？　ハアアアッ！？

engChrName: H-Huh?!
engSearchText: H-Huh?!
jpnChrName: え、え……
jpnSearchText: え、え……

engChrName: Wait, then...
engSearchText: Wait, then...
jpnChrName: ……それって………
jpnSearchText: ……それって………
………………………………

engChrName: I have no doubt that you truly are enemies deep down.
engSearchText:
I have no doubt that you truly are enemies
deep down.
jpnChrName: ……黒月とアルマータが 本気で対立しているのは本当だろう。
jpnSearchText:
……黒月とアルマータが
本気で対立しているのは本当だろう。

engChrName: Had a battle broken out, I'm sure you woulda gone all out on 'em.
engSearchText:
Had a battle broken out, I'm sure you woulda gone all
out on 'em.
jpnChrName: 今回、お互いこの地で ガチで戦争をするつもりだったのもな。
jpnSearchText:
今回、お互いこの地で
ガチで戦争をするつもりだったのもな。

engChrName: That said, I think you guys ended up findin' something you agree on.
engSearchText:
That said, I think you guys ended up findin'
something you agree on.
jpnChrName: だが──ある一点についてのみは “協定”に近いことが連中と結ばれていた。
jpnSearchText:
だが──ある一点についてのみは
“協定”に近いことが連中と結ばれていた。

engChrName: Somethin' that only you and the other elders would know about.
engSearchText:
Somethin' that only you and the other elders would
know about.
jpnChrName: ギエン・ルウ──あんたと、 恐らく他の長老のみが知る密約として。
jpnSearchText:
ギエン・ルウ──あんたと、
恐らく他の長老のみが知る密約として。

engChrName: You mean...?
engSearchText: You mean...?
jpnChrName: 密約……
jpnSearchText: 密約……

engChrName: No way... You've gotta be shittin' me.
engSearchText: No way... You've gotta be shittin' me.
jpnChrName: オイオイ…… ……何を馬鹿な………
jpnSearchText:
オイオイ……
……何を馬鹿な………

engChrName: I'm reminded of a certain phrase you used: 'Let external woes reveal internal wounds.'
engSearchText:
I'm reminded of a certain phrase you used: 'Let
external woes reveal internal wounds.'
jpnChrName: ……あの言葉……… 『外禍を通じ内患を見定める』ですか。
jpnSearchText:
……あの言葉………
『外禍を通じ内患を見定める』ですか。

engChrName: Obvious one is the external woe bein' Almata.
engSearchText: Obvious one is the external woe bein' Almata.
jpnChrName: ああ…… “外禍”は当然だが《アルマータ》。
jpnSearchText:
ああ……
“外禍”は当然だが《アルマータ》。

engChrName: ...But that makes the internal wound the Tyrant here.
engSearchText: ...But that makes the internal wound the Tyrant here.
jpnChrName: “内患”は── つまりは《大君》ってわけだ。
jpnSearchText:
“内患”は──
つまりは《大君》ってわけだ。
！！！

engChrName: I've got plenty of circumstantial evidence for my theory.
engSearchText:
I've got plenty of circumstantial evidence for
my theory.
jpnChrName: 状況証拠だけなら幾らでもある。
jpnSearchText: 状況証拠だけなら幾らでもある。

engChrName: First, there's the story of how a certain device got into the hands of a street merchant and eventually Almata.
engSearchText:
First, there's the story of how a certain device got into
the hands of a street merchant and eventually Almata.
jpnChrName: 一つは、露天商が半グレに奪われて アルマータの手に渡った“とある装置”。
jpnSearchText:
一つは、露天商が半グレに奪われて
アルマータの手に渡った“とある装置”。

engChrName: Shortly after someone gave it to the merchant, it happened to be stolen by a bunch of thugs.
engSearchText:
Shortly after someone gave it to the merchant, it
happened to be stolen by a bunch of thugs.
jpnChrName: あの露天商自体は“誰か”に託され、 それを半グレに奪われた流れだが……
jpnSearchText:
あの露天商自体は“誰か”に託され、
それを半グレに奪われた流れだが……

engChrName: Timing's awfully convenient, ain't it?
engSearchText: Timing's awfully convenient, ain't it?
jpnChrName: アンタがアルマータの手に渡るように 段取ってたとすれば全て説明がつく。
jpnSearchText:
アンタがアルマータの手に渡るように
段取ってたとすれば全て説明がつく。

engChrName: And don't forget only Heiyue knew that device was sealed away here.
engSearchText:
And don't forget only Heiyue knew that device was
sealed away here.
jpnChrName: そもそも黒月が封鎖していたこの地に 先代大君と共に眠っていた品だしな。
jpnSearchText:
そもそも黒月が封鎖していたこの地に
先代大君と共に眠っていた品だしな。

engChrName: Why not just hand it over directly?
engSearchText: Why not just hand it over directly?
jpnChrName: それを回収してそんな形で…… ……なんでそんな回りくどいことを。
jpnSearchText:
それを回収してそんな形で……
……なんでそんな回りくどいことを。

engChrName: Plausible deniability. They can pass the whole affair off as a mistake if they get caught.
engSearchText:
Plausible deniability. They can pass the whole affair
off as a mistake if they get caught.
jpnChrName: それが政治──だからでしょう。 敵対者に直接渡す体裁にしないための。
jpnSearchText:
それが政治──だからでしょう。
敵対者に直接渡す体裁にしないための。
………………………………

engChrName: Second, there's those Almata guys knowin' way too much about the Tyrant and what went down here.
engSearchText:
Second, there's those Almata guys knowin' way too
much about the Tyrant and what went down here.
jpnChrName: もう一つは、アルマータの連中が 余りに４０年前の話に詳しかったことだ。
jpnSearchText:
もう一つは、アルマータの連中が
余りに４０年前の話に詳しかったことだ。

engChrName: Only the old folks around here even know it happened, but if you ask 'em about it, they clam up real quick.
engSearchText:
Only the old folks around here even know it
happened, but if you ask 'em about it, they clam up
real quick.
jpnChrName: 意図的に隠蔽され、街でも老人しか知らず、 ほぼ口を閉ざしているような“真実”……
jpnSearchText:
意図的に隠蔽され、街でも老人しか知らず、
ほぼ口を閉ざしているような“真実”……

engChrName: So how did a bunch of young outsiders hear about a local taboo? Must've had a source.
engSearchText:
So how did a bunch of young outsiders hear about
a local taboo? Must've had a source.
jpnChrName: 北部のメッセルダムが拠点の連中に “誰”がそれを教えたんだろうな？
jpnSearchText:
北部のメッセルダムが拠点の連中に
“誰”がそれを教えたんだろうな？

engChrName: Oh...
engSearchText: Oh...

engChrName: Lǎo Yéye...?
engSearchText: Lǎo Yéye...?
jpnSearchText: ……爺、さん…………

engChrName: Third, there's the old man's attitude toward Aaron here.
engSearchText:
Third, there's the old man's attitude toward
Aaron here.
jpnChrName: ３つめはアンタのそいつへの態度だ。
jpnSearchText: ３つめはアンタのそいつへの態度だ。

engChrName: Sounds like you all used to get along real well, his mom included.
engSearchText:
Sounds like you all used to get along real well, his
mom included.
jpnChrName: 昔は仲が良かったそうじゃねえか？ 家族ぐるみで、そいつの母親も込みで。
jpnSearchText:
昔は仲が良かったそうじゃねえか？
家族ぐるみで、そいつの母親も込みで。

engChrName: Don't know what it is about the kid, but people really take a shine to him—'specially old folks like you.
engSearchText:
Don't know what it is about the kid, but people really
take a shine to him—'specially old folks like you.
jpnChrName: ムカつくがそいつは人に好かれる質（たち）だ。 特にアンタみたいな老人なんかにはな。
jpnSearchText:
ムカつくがそいつは人に好かれる質（たち）だ。
特にアンタみたいな老人なんかにはな。

engChrName: So why'd you suddenly turn cold on him? There's gotta be a reason.
engSearchText:
So why'd you suddenly turn cold on him?
There's gotta be a reason.
jpnChrName: どうして──何の前触れもなく えらく冷たく当たるようになった？
jpnSearchText:
どうして──何の前触れもなく
えらく冷たく当たるようになった？

engChrName: He's full of it...right?
engSearchText: He's full of it...right?
jpnChrName: ウソ、だろ……ギエン爺さん？ ……ウソだと、言ってくれよ……！
jpnSearchText:
ウソ、だろ……ギエン爺さん？
……ウソだと、言ってくれよ……！

engChrName: All three of his assertions are correct.
engSearchText: All three of his assertions are correct.
jpnChrName: 全部──その男の指摘通りだ。
jpnSearchText: 全部──その男の指摘通りだ。

engChrName: Despite Cao's recommendation, I did not expect you to be quite this perceptive, spriggan.
engSearchText:
Despite Cao's recommendation, I did not expect you
to be quite this perceptive, spriggan.
jpnChrName: ツァオが見込んだ者とはいえ よもやそこまで見抜かれるとはな。
jpnSearchText:
ツァオが見込んだ者とはいえ
よもやそこまで見抜かれるとはな。

engChrName: Why would you do that?!
engSearchText: Why would you do that?!
jpnChrName: なんでだッ──！？ どうしてそんなことをッッ！！？
jpnSearchText:
なんでだッ──！？
どうしてそんなことをッッ！！？

engChrName: You were so kind to us!
engSearchText: You were so kind to us!
jpnChrName: アンタは昔は優しかった……！！
jpnSearchText: アンタは昔は優しかった……！！

engChrName: Mom loved you like family!
engSearchText: Mom loved you like family!
jpnChrName: 近所のジッチャンとして 俺にもオフクロにも良くしてくれた！
jpnSearchText:
近所のジッチャンとして
俺にもオフクロにも良くしてくれた！

engChrName: What changed? When did you start seeing me so differently?!
engSearchText:
What changed? When did you start seeing me
so differently?!
jpnChrName: いつからだ……！？ いつから俺のことを──！？
jpnSearchText:
いつからだ……！？
いつから俺のことを──！？

engChrName: The signs began to appear in recent years.
engSearchText: The signs began to appear in recent years.
jpnChrName: ここ数年だ。
jpnSearchText: ここ数年だ。

engChrName: The last Tyrant was a charismatic young man, just like you.
engSearchText:
The last Tyrant was a charismatic young man, just
like you.
jpnChrName: ──かつての“先代”もヌシのごとき あらゆる者を大いに惹き付ける若者だった。
jpnSearchText:
──かつての“先代”もヌシのごとき
あらゆる者を大いに惹き付ける若者だった。

engChrName: With each passing year, you came to resemble him more and more.
engSearchText:
With each passing year, you came to resemble him
more and more.
jpnChrName: 成長し、頭角を現していくヌシは 儂の中で日に日に“彼”と重なっていった。
jpnSearchText:
成長し、頭角を現していくヌシは
儂の中で日に日に“彼”と重なっていった。

engChrName: I had no choice but to discover the truth—no matter the cost.
engSearchText:
I had no choice but to discover the truth—no matter
the cost.
jpnChrName: だから、確かめねばならなかった。 ──どんな手を使ってでも。
jpnSearchText:
だから、確かめねばならなかった。
──どんな手を使ってでも。

engChrName: Hold on... Did you know my friends and the town were going to be in danger this whole time...?
engSearchText:
Hold on... Did you know my friends and the town
were going to be in danger this whole time...?
jpnChrName: ッ……まさかセイたちが殺されたのも、 アンタの予想内だったって言うのかッ！？
jpnSearchText:
ッ……まさかセイたちが殺されたのも、
アンタの予想内だったって言うのかッ！？

engChrName: Answer me!
engSearchText: Answer me!
jpnChrName: 答えてくれよ！！　爺さん───！！！！
jpnSearchText: 答えてくれよ！！　爺さん───！！！！

engChrName: We did not intend for a tragedy to take place, but we understood the risks well.
engSearchText:
We did not intend for a tragedy to take place, but we
understood the risks well.
jpnChrName: ……当然、備えはしていたが あれについては奴らに上を行かれた。
jpnSearchText:
……当然、備えはしていたが
あれについては奴らに上を行かれた。

engChrName: I deeply regret that innocent people lost their lives.
engSearchText: I deeply regret that innocent people lost their lives.
jpnChrName: 幾許かの犠牲は織り込み済みではあったが ……セイたちには可哀想なことをした。
jpnSearchText:
幾許かの犠牲は織り込み済みではあったが
……セイたちには可哀想なことをした。

engChrName: They... They died for THIS?!
engSearchText: They... They died for THIS?!
jpnChrName: ……あいつら………あいつらは………… そんなことのために…………………………
jpnSearchText:
……あいつら………あいつらは…………
そんなことのために…………………………

engChrName: Such was the will of Heiyue. If you dislike the system that reached this conclusion, then use your right to change it.
engSearchText:
Such was the will of Heiyue. If you dislike the system
that reached this conclusion, then use your right to
change it.
jpnChrName: ──これが“今の”黒月のやり方だ。 不満なら、ヌシがそれを変えればいい。
jpnSearchText:
──これが“今の”黒月のやり方だ。
不満なら、ヌシがそれを変えればいい。

engChrName: ...What?
engSearchText: ...What?
jpnSearchText: ………ぇ………

engChrName: Chaos and trials unknown lie ahead, that much is certain.
engSearchText:
Chaos and trials unknown lie ahead, that much
is certain.
jpnChrName: この先は疑いようもなく混迷の時代── かつてない試練が待ち受けているだろう。
jpnSearchText:
この先は疑いようもなく混迷の時代──
かつてない試練が待ち受けているだろう。

engChrName: But if you are there to guide us, Heiyue will undoubtedly overcome them all.
engSearchText:
But if you are there to guide us, Heiyue will
undoubtedly overcome them all.
jpnChrName: だがヌシが先頭に立つならば 黒月がそれを乗り越えることも叶おう。
jpnSearchText:
だがヌシが先頭に立つならば
黒月がそれを乗り越えることも叶おう。

engChrName: We need you to be the great, unfeeling Tyrant.
engSearchText: We need you to be the great, unfeeling Tyrant.
jpnChrName: ただしそれは── 非情にして巨いなる《大君》として。
jpnSearchText:
ただしそれは──
非情にして巨いなる《大君》として。

engChrName: So you're just lookin' for someone to take the burden of leadership away.
engSearchText:
So you're just lookin' for someone to take the burden
of leadership away.
jpnChrName: ……こいつを神輿に担ごうってか。
jpnSearchText: ……こいつを神輿に担ごうってか。

engChrName: But that someone's not even the man himself.
engSearchText: But that someone's not even the man himself.
jpnChrName: しかもこいつ自身じゃなく、 《大君》とやらに仕立て上げて。
jpnSearchText:
しかもこいつ自身じゃなく、
《大君》とやらに仕立て上げて。

engChrName: Correct. That is what is best for Heiyue.
engSearchText: Correct. That is what is best for Heiyue.
jpnChrName: 然り──全ては黒月のためだ。
jpnSearchText: 然り──全ては黒月のためだ。

engChrName: The xiongshou!
engSearchText: The xiongshou!
jpnChrName: 隠形……！
jpnSearchText: 隠形……！

engChrName: H-Have they been here this whole time?
engSearchText: H-Have they been here this whole time?
jpnChrName: さ、最初から控えて……
jpnSearchText: さ、最初から控えて……

engChrName: Bah...
engSearchText: Bah...
jpnChrName: チッ……！
jpnSearchText: チッ……！

engChrName: Take him away.
engSearchText: Take him away.
jpnChrName: 連れて行け。
jpnSearchText: 連れて行け。

engChrName: Enough.
engSearchText: Enough.
jpnChrName: ──そこまでです。
jpnSearchText: ──そこまでです。
……！？

engChrName: Who's that...?!
engSearchText: Who's that...?!
jpnSearchText: 新手──！？

engChrName: Yin. If you're here, that means...
engSearchText: Yin. If you're here, that means...
jpnChrName: 《銀》──当代か。 ということは………
jpnSearchText:
《銀》──当代か。
ということは………

engChrName: Please stop this, Father.
engSearchText: Please stop this, Father.
jpnChrName: 父上── これ以上はお止めください。
jpnSearchText:
父上──
これ以上はお止めください。

engChrName: I see you've disobeyed my orders and returned early, Cao.
engSearchText:
I see you've disobeyed my orders and returned
early, Cao.
jpnChrName: ツァオ……儂の言いつけに反して 一日早く戻ってきたか。
jpnSearchText:
ツァオ……儂の言いつけに反して
一日早く戻ってきたか。

engChrName: This is purely by coincidence, I assure you.
engSearchText: This is purely by coincidence, I assure you.
jpnChrName: いえいえ、偶然ですよ。
jpnSearchText: いえいえ、偶然ですよ。

engChrName: Negotiations went so smoothly, I was afforded the chance to come lend you my aid.
engSearchText:
Negotiations went so smoothly, I was afforded the
chance to come lend you my aid.
jpnChrName: 予想外に早く交渉がまとまったので 参上した次第です。
jpnSearchText:
予想外に早く交渉がまとまったので
参上した次第です。

engChrName: Yéye, please stop! Hasn't Aaron suffered enough?!
engSearchText: Yéye, please stop! Hasn't Aaron suffered enough?!
jpnChrName: もうやめて、爷爷（イェイェ）！ これ以上アーロンを苦しめないで……！
jpnSearchText:
もうやめて、爷爷（イェイェ）！
これ以上アーロンを苦しめないで……！

engChrName: Ashen...
engSearchText: Ashen...
jpnChrName: ……アシェン………
jpnSearchText: ……アシェン………

engChrName: Elaine, you're all right!
engSearchText: Elaine, you're all right!
jpnChrName: エレインさんも……
jpnSearchText: エレインさんも……

engChrName: Yes, and I'm glad to see you all in one piece.
engSearchText: Yes, and I'm glad to see you all in one piece.
jpnChrName: ふう、何とか無事みたいね。
jpnSearchText: ふう、何とか無事みたいね。

engChrName: Melchior got away, but thankfully Maxim and his companions are safe now.
engSearchText:
Melchior got away, but thankfully Maxim and his
companions are safe now.
jpnChrName: こっちはあの幹部（メルキオル）には逃げられたけど マクシムさんたちは何とか逃がしたわ。
jpnSearchText:
こっちはあの幹部（メルキオル）には逃げられたけど
マクシムさんたちは何とか逃がしたわ。

engChrName: Got'cha.
engSearchText: Got'cha.
jpnChrName: そうか……
jpnSearchText: そうか……

engChrName: I think I have a rough understanding of the situation here.
engSearchText:
I think I have a rough understanding of the
situation here.
jpnChrName: 状況は概ね理解しているつもりです。
jpnSearchText: 状況は概ね理解しているつもりです。

engChrName: I have no intention of meddling in Heiyue's internal affairs—however, I must see to the safety of this civilian.
engSearchText:
I have no intention of meddling in Heiyue's internal
affairs—however, I must see to the safety of
this civilian.
jpnChrName: 黒月内部の話──とはいえ、 そちらの彼はまだ民間人でしょう。
jpnSearchText:
黒月内部の話──とはいえ、
そちらの彼はまだ民間人でしょう。

engChrName: The guild will not stand idly by and allow you to detain this young man.
engSearchText:
The guild will not stand idly by and allow you to
detain this young man.
jpnChrName: 強引に連れて行こうというのなら ギルドも黙っていられませんが……？
jpnSearchText:
強引に連れて行こうというのなら
ギルドも黙っていられませんが……？

engChrName: Ah... I see.
engSearchText: Ah... I see.
jpnChrName: ……フ、成程な。
jpnSearchText: ……フ、成程な。

engChrName: With Beauty's Blade and Yin on your side, I dare say our advantage has dissolved.
engSearchText:
With Beauty's Blade and Yin on your side, I dare say
our advantage has dissolved.
jpnChrName: 剣の乙女に、《当代》── 少しばかり均衡が崩れたか。
jpnSearchText:
剣の乙女に、《当代》──
少しばかり均衡が崩れたか。

engChrName: I believe we're still on even footing.
engSearchText: I believe we're still on even footing.
jpnChrName: ……いえ、五分と五分かと。
jpnSearchText: ……いえ、五分と五分かと。

engChrName: So Mond crafted a worthy successor after all. Perhaps you will even surpass him given time.
engSearchText:
So Mond crafted a worthy successor after all.
Perhaps you will even surpass him given time.
jpnChrName: よい気当たりだ。 いずれ先代（モンド）にも届こう。
jpnSearchText:
よい気当たりだ。
いずれ先代（モンド）にも届こう。

engChrName: You flatter me.
engSearchText: You flatter me.
jpnChrName: 恐縮です。
jpnSearchText: 恐縮です。

engChrName: (She's become stronger in the last year and a half.)
engSearchText: (She's become stronger in the last year and a half.)
jpnChrName: （一年半ぶり……   更に腕を上げたみたいね。）
jpnSearchText:
（一年半ぶり……
更に腕を上げたみたいね。）

engChrName: Father, I was aware of the Tyrant situation, but I'm shocked that the elders stooped to working with our enemies.
engSearchText:
Father, I was aware of the Tyrant situation, but I'm
shocked that the elders stooped to working with
our enemies.
jpnChrName: ……《大君》の件は聞いていましたが 敵と交渉して今回の段取りをするとは。
jpnSearchText:
……《大君》の件は聞いていましたが
敵と交渉して今回の段取りをするとは。

engChrName: The council may be our leadership, but surely this was a step too far.
engSearchText:
The council may be our leadership, but surely this was
a step too far.
jpnChrName: いかに長老会とはいえ、 あまりに独断が過ぎましょう。
jpnSearchText:
いかに長老会とはいえ、
あまりに独断が過ぎましょう。

engChrName: That attitude is exactly why you were not informed.
engSearchText: That attitude is exactly why you were not informed.
jpnChrName: だから話さなかったのだ。
jpnSearchText: だから話さなかったのだ。

engChrName: You still lack what it takes to serve as an elder of Heiyue.
engSearchText:
You still lack what it takes to serve as an elder
of Heiyue.
jpnChrName: ヌシは確かに次代の長老だが、 足りぬ所もまだまだ多い。
jpnSearchText:
ヌシは確かに次代の長老だが、
足りぬ所もまだまだ多い。

engChrName: I can't say I disagree.
engSearchText: I can't say I disagree.
jpnChrName: ええ、貴方に比べればいまだ未熟……
jpnSearchText: ええ、貴方に比べればいまだ未熟……

engChrName: But that's why I've learned to rely on others to cover my shortcomings.
engSearchText:
But that's why I've learned to rely on others to cover
my shortcomings.
jpnChrName: ──ですが“力”を借りる術は それなりに身に付けているつもりです。
jpnSearchText:
──ですが“力”を借りる術は
それなりに身に付けているつもりです。

engChrName: Evidently so.
engSearchText: Evidently so.
jpnChrName: ………そのようだな。
jpnSearchText: ………そのようだな。

engChrName: The charisma we sought ended up being our undoing, I suppose.
engSearchText:
The charisma we sought ended up being our undoing,
I suppose.
jpnChrName: フッ……そして これもヌシの“縁”というわけか。
jpnSearchText:
フッ……そして
これもヌシの“縁”というわけか。

engChrName: Gien...
engSearchText: Gien...
jpnChrName: 爺さん、オレは………
jpnSearchText: 爺さん、オレは………

engChrName: Very well. The older generation shall yield on this matter.
engSearchText:
Very well. The older generation shall yield on
this matter.
jpnChrName: ならば此度の件については 年寄りは引っ込むとしよう──
jpnSearchText:
ならば此度の件については
年寄りは引っ込むとしよう──

engChrName: I must face the council and answer for the lives lost due to my actions.
engSearchText:
I must face the council and answer for the lives lost
due to my actions.
jpnChrName: セイたちの犠牲は我が不始末、 長老会にて雪ぐつもりだ。
jpnSearchText:
セイたちの犠牲は我が不始末、
長老会にて雪ぐつもりだ。
ぁ……

engChrName: But be warned, young ones—our foes' offensive has only just begun.
engSearchText:
But be warned, young ones—our foes' offensive has
only just begun.
jpnChrName: かの者たちの攻勢はこれから── くれぐれも気を抜かぬことだ。
jpnSearchText:
